name: Stone Brick Fireplace Cap
description: A Stone Brick Fireplace Cap is the final cap piece to place on a Stone Brick Fireplace Extension or directly on a Stone Brick Fireplace . Two variants, a half height and full height, are available by holding the 'R' key when deploying.
crafted_at: Advanced Masonry Bench Electric Masonry Bench
